description: A cozy statement piece that embodies Cotopaxi's commitments to sustainability and style, the Abrazo puts a Cotopaxi spin on the classic fleece zip-up jacket with fresh color patterns and recycled fabric. In addition to its full-zip design that allows for quick temperature control and easy on/off, this soft and stylish fleece features a cozy hood, front hand pockets, and a stretchy, zippered chest pocket to stash your small must-haves.
name: Cotopaxi Abrazo Hooded Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Mens
